ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Hiatus time, I think.
ygData.msgSnippet: Crier, Please stay - I for one really enjoy your posts and your contributions. A kill file or Inbox assistant rules wizard does *wonders* to filter the good
ygData.messageBody:
Crier,

Please stay - I for one really enjoy your posts and your contributions. A
"kill file" or Inbox assistant rules wizard does *wonders* to filter the
good stuff from the mere noise. It is alot easier to ignore the crap when
you never see it in the first place. And those who do read it, recognise
what is merely "bellowing" vs "clarity." You have always been singing
clarity!!

"Illegitimi Non-Carborundrum!" (Dont let the bastiages grind you down.)

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bardette of 48 songs
... somewhere on Innoruuk
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly


> From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
>
> Crier don't leave. I appologise for even debating the issue with
Harmonic.
> While his statement was out of line, I should have just given up talking
> sense to him once I realized he refused to listen to reason, or to have a
> sense of humor.

> Stick around, the fun never ends ;)
>
> Lyrnia

> > From: "JasonF" <jasonf@...>
> >
> > However, I do believe that I will take my leave of it for a while, at
> least
> > until the expansion comes out. I simply don't need the kind of bile
> quoted
> > below in my inbox on Monday morning.
